text: Bad Berneck () is a spa town in the district of Bayreuth, in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the White Main river, in the Fichtelgebirge mountains, 13 km northeast of Bayreuth. == References == == Other websites == * Kur und Tourismus GmbH in Bad Berneck * Bad Berneck im Fichtelgebirge Category:Bayreuth (district) Category:Spa towns in Germany
title: Bad Berneck im Fichtelgebirge
